messages.title: Why I’m backing Liz Pole
messages.content: Liz’s fight for Devon on many of the first occasions of our devolved South West European Regional Development Agency shows her ingenuity and talent, combined with financial know-how. Our area badly needs talent and energy combined with local understanding to deliver on new opportunities. I am confident Liz can inspire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for the interests of our children and teachers. Reverse Conservative cuts, including £578 per pupil cut from local schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle the NHS and social care crises
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increased funding for the NHS and social care services. Resolve Care Quality Commission issues that led to the closure of Axminster and Ottery St. Mary community hospitals.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight climate change and create jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promote sustainable energy investment such as field-scale solar arrays, district heating schemes, and an electric vehicle revolution.

mentions.candidate: Only Labour can beat the Tories here!
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Only a vote for Labour can beat the Tories here.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour came a strong second in 2017 in Tiverton & Honiton with 15,670 votes, over three times as many as the Liberal Democrats.

community.content: Increased funding for the NHS and social care services will benefit our local communities.
